title: Otolaryngology Surgery Education: Online Video-Based Tympanoplasty Training Course Using Endoscopy

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Overcoming temporal and spatial constraints through smartphone-based video learning, providing high-quality surgical education within public institutions' limited budgets.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify over 80% of the steps in Type 1 tympanoplasty and myringoplasty procedures
Learners can apply at least five LAP-VEGaS assessment criteria to judge educational quality when analyzing surgical videos
Learners can watch 15-minute educational videos in mobile environments with over 90% completion rates and explain core surgical techniques

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
